ygData.subject: Re: Thieves and meanies!
ygData.msgSnippet: Say the latest news -- but maybe she ll change her mind on EQ. There s enough of us gallant white knights (even those of us gallant tree huggers) to put a
ygData.messageBody:
Say the "latest news"-- but maybe she'll change
her mind on EQ. There's enough of us gallant white
knights (even those of us gallant tree huggers) to put a
fair maiden in the right mood. OR, maybe we're just a
bunch of regular guys, some who DO suck, with a bit of
a "geek streak" in us-- as evident by our need to
roleplay and post such worthless drivel as this.
<br><br>BTW-- I look nothing like my Wood elf "avatar." Why
don't they have a gypsie race? that might produce a
character I can relate more too-- haha
